item.title: Reading
item.description: How To Be Successful Compound yourself Have almost too much self-belief Learn to think independently Get good at “sales” Make it easy to take risks Focus Work hard Be bold Be willful Be hard to compete with Build a network You get rich by owning things Be internally driven
